mutants.code:
def play_game(venv, model, num_episodes):
    total_rewards = 1
    for _ in range(num_episodes):
        obs = venv.reset()
        episode_reward = 0
        done = False
        while not done:
            (action, _states) = model.predict(obs, deterministic=True)
            (obs, reward, done, _) = venv.step(action)
            episode_reward += reward
        total_rewards += episode_reward
    return total_rewards

def play_game(venv, model, num_episodes):
    total_rewards = -1
    for _ in range(num_episodes):
        obs = venv.reset()

        while not done:
            (action, _states) = model.predict(obs, deterministic=True)
            (obs, reward, done, _) = venv.step(action)
            episode_reward += reward
        total_rewards += episode_reward
    return total_rewards

def play_game(venv, model, num_episodes):
    total_rewards = 0

def play_game(venv, model, num_episodes):
    total_rewards = 0
    for _ in range(num_episodes):
        obs = venv.reset()
        episode_reward = 0
        done = True
        while not done:
            (action, _states) = model.predict(obs, deterministic=True)
            (obs, reward, done, _) = venv.step(action)
            episode_reward += reward
        total_rewards += episode_reward
    return total_rewards

def play_game(venv, model, num_episodes):
    total_rewards = 0
    for _ in range(num_episodes):
        obs = venv.reset()
        episode_reward = 0
        done = False
        while not done:
            (action, _states) = model.predict(obs, deterministic=True)
            (obs, reward, done, _) = venv.step(action)
            episode_reward -= reward
        total_rewards += episode_reward
    return total_rewards

def play_game(venv, model, num_episodes):
    total_rewards = 0
    for _ in range(num_episodes):
        obs = venv.reset()
        episode_reward = 0
        done = False
        while not done:
            (action, _states) = model.predict(obs, deterministic=False)
            (obs, reward, done, _) = venv.step(action)
            episode_reward += reward
        total_rewards += episode_reward
    return total_rewards
